questions.question: What is the purpose of the pre-commissioning checklist?

answers.a: To verify the completion of commissioning activities
answers.b: To identify potential hazards and risks
answers.c: To ensure equipment is properly installed and aligned

questions.question: What type of testing is performed on electrical systems during pre-commissioning?
What document is used to verify the completion of pre-commissioning activities?
What is the primary focus of safety and environmental checks during pre-commissioning?

answers.a: To ensure equipment is properly installed
answers.b: To verify system performance under load
answers.c: To identify potential hazards and risks
answers.d: To train operators on safety procedures

questions.question: What is the purpose of functional testing during pre-commissioning?

answers.b: To test system performance under load
answers.c: To verify system functionality and performance
answers.d: To train operators on system operation

questions.question: What is the final step in the pre-commissioning process?

answers.b: Functional testing of systems and equipment
answers.c: Handover of the plant to operations
